metadata.synopsis: A Shar cultist speculating about what is going to happen following the defeat of Viconia, the cult's now-former leader.

0.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
0.text: The Mother Superior is gone... I can only hope for mercy.
0.context: NodeContext: Speaking to self/no one in particular, unpacking recent events. (There was a coup against the Shar cult's leadership - this cultist was a loyalist but survived the conflict that ensued)

1.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
1.text: I never would have imagined her losing control of this place.
1.context: NodeContext: Speaking to self/no one in particular, unpacking recent events. (There was a coup against the Shar cult's leadership - this cultist was a loyalist but survived the conflict that ensued)

2.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
2.text: This is Lady Shar's will. It must be.
2.context: NodeContext: Speaking to self/no one in particular, unpacking recent events. (There was a coup against the Shar cult's leadership - this cultist was a loyalist but survived the conflict that ensued)

3.speaker: Justiciar Crusader Owltalon
3.text: No matter, I can be loyal to the new leadership now, if allowed.
3.context: NodeContext: Speaking to self/no one in particular, unpacking recent events. (There was a coup against the Shar cult's leadership - this cultist was a loyalist but survived the conflict that ensued)
